word:
The Trees of the Lord. 

                                      "Elmshaven" Sanitarium, Cal. 
                                                  June 26, 1902. 

Dear Brethren Kilgore and Jacobs:-- 
     The Lord has been giving me light in regard to many things. He has shown me that our Sanitarium should be erected on as high an elevation as is necessary to secure the best results, and that they are to be surrounded by extensive tracts of land, beautified by flowers and ornamental trees.
